docs.text: Welcome to iHarbour Documentation GitHub What is iHarbour? iHarbour is an interpreter of Harbour language for iOS devices. You can have all the power of Harbour adapted for your favourite iOS devices. iHarbour lets you make apps for iPhone and iPad on Harbour.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: iHarbour is an interpreter of Harbour language for iOS devices. You can have all the power of Harbour adapted for your favourite iOS devices. iHarbour lets you make apps for iPhone and iPad on Harbour.
docs.title: What is iHarbour?

docs.text: Classes hButton Class for creating UIButton. CreateButton( (String)title, (par)x, (par)y, (par)width, (par)height ) -> hButton title: (String) Title of the button. x: (par) x position on the view. y: (par) y position on the view. width: (par) Width of the button. height: (par) Height of the button. Functions Button_SetTitle( (hButton)btn, (String)title ) Changes the title of the button. Button_SetBackgroundColor ( (hButton)btn, (par)red, (par)green, (par)blue, (par)alpha ) Changes the background color of the button. Button_SetCorners( (hButton)btn, (par)pixels ) Set the button corners rounded. hLabel Class for creating UILabel. CreateLabel( (String)text, (par)x, (par)y, (par)width, (par)height ) -> hLabel text: (String) Text of the label. x: (par) x position on the view. y: (par) y position on the view. width: (par) Width of the label. height: (par) Height of the label. Functions Label_SetText( (hLabel)lbl, (String)text ) Set the label text. Label_SetColor( (hLabel)lbl, (par)red, (par)green, (par)blue, (par)alpha ) Changes the text color of the label. Label_Aligment( (hLabel)lbl, (par)alignment ) Set the label text alignment (1-left, 2-center, 3-right, 4-justified). hTextField Class for creating UITextField. CreateTextField( (par)x, (par)y, (par)width, (par)height, (String)placeholder) -> hTextField x: (par) x position on the view. y: (par) y position on the view. width: (par) Width of the text field. height: (par) Height of the text field. placeholder: (String) Text of text field placeholder. Functions TextField_GetText( (hTextField)txtField ) -> String Returns the content of the text field.
docs.title: Classes
